member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application
member.summary: Represents the entire Microsoft Office Outlook application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.#ctor
member.summary: This method supports the Outlook primary interop assembly infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.#ctor(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.IHostItemProvider,Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.IRuntimeServiceProvider,System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: This method supports the Outlook primary interop assembly infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.AdvancedSearchComplete
member.summary: Occurs when the AdvancedSearch method has completed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.AdvancedSearchStopped
member.summary: Occurs when a specified Search object's Stop method has been executed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.ItemSend
member.summary: Occurs whenever an item is sent, either by the user through an Inspector (before the inspector is closed, but after the user clicks the Send button) or when the Send method is used in a program.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.MAPILogonComplete
member.summary: Occurs after the user has logged onto the system.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.NewMail
member.summary: Occurs when one or more new e-mail messages are received in the Inbox.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.NewMailEx
member.summary: Occurs when one or more new items are received in the Inbox. This event passes a list of entry IDs of all the items received in the Inbox since the last time the event was fired.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.OptionsPagesAdd
member.summary: Occurs whenever the Options dialog box (on the Tools menu) or a folder Properties dialog box is opened.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.QuitEvent
member.summary: Occurs when Microsoft Office Outlook begins to close.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Reminder
member.summary: Occurs immediately before a reminder is displayed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Shutdown
member.summary: Occurs when Outlook shuts down.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.ActiveExplorer
member.summary: Returns the topmost Explorer object on the desktop. If no explorer is active, returns null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.ActiveInspector
member.summary: Returns the topmost Inspector object on the desktop. If no inspector is active, returns null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.ActiveWindow
member.summary: Returns an object representing the topmost Microsoft Office Outlook window on the desktop, either an Explorer or an Inspector object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.AdvancedSearch(System.String,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Performs a search based on a specified Microsoft SQL Server search string and returns a Search object.
member.param: The scope of the search. For example, the name of a folder. It is recommended that the folder name is enclosed within single quotes. Otherwise, the search might not return correct results if the folder name contains special characters including Unicode characters.
Determines if the search will include any of the folder's subfolders.
The name given as an identifier for the search.
The DASL search filter that defines the parameters of the search.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.BeginInit
member.summary: Begins the Initialization of the Application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.CopyFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies a file from a specified location into a Microsoft Office Outlook store and returns an object representing the copied document.
member.param: The path name of the object you want to copy.
The location you want to copy the file to.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.CreateItem(Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlItemType)
member.summary: Creates a new Microsoft Office Outlook item and returns it. The CreateItem method can only create default Outlook items. To create new items using a custom form, use the Add method on the Items collection.
member.param: The OlItemType for the new item.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.CreateItemFromTemplate(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new Microsoft Office Outlook item from an Outlook template (.oft) and returns the new item.
member.param: The path and file name of the Outlook template for the new item.
The folder in which the item is to be created. If this argument is omitted, the default folder for the item type will be used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.CreateObject(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an Automation object of the specified class. If the application is already running, CreateObject will create a new instance.
member.param: The class name of the object to create.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes the Application object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.EndInit
member.summary: The ending of the initialization of the Outlook application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.GetNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a NameSpace object of the specified type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.IsSearchSynchronous(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a Boolean indicating if a search will be synchronous or asynchronous.
member.param: The path name of the folders that the search will search through. It is recommended that the folder name is enclosed within single quotes.

member.summary: This method supports the Outlook primary interop assembly infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.OnShutdown
member.summary: Occurs when the application is shutdown.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.OnStartup
member.summary: Occurs when the application starts up.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Quit
member.summary: Occurs when Microsoft Office Outlook begins to close.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.AnswerWizard
member.summary: Gets the AnswerWizard object for the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Assistant
member.summary: Gets an Assistant object that represents the Microsoft Office Assistant.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Class
member.summary: Gets an OlObjectClass constant indicating the Application class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.COMAddIns
member.summary: Gets a COMAddIns collection that represents all the Component Object Model (COM) add-ins currently loaded in Microsoft Office Outlook.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Explorers
member.summary: Gets an Explorers collection object that contains the Explorer objects representing all open explorers.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Inspectors
member.summary: Gets an Inspectors collection object that contains the Inspector objects representing all open inspectors.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.LanguageSettings
member.summary: Gets a LanguageSettings object for the application that contains the language-specific attributes of Microsoft Office Outlook.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Name
member.summary: Gets the display name for the Application object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent Object of the Application object

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.ProductCode
member.summary: Gets the Microsoft Office Outlook globally unique identifier (GUID) .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Reminders
member.summary: Gets a Reminders collection that represents all current reminders.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Session
member.summary: Gets the NameSpace object for the current session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets the Tag property of the Application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Application.Version
